code: import{useQuery}from"react-query";import Http from"./http.api";var MainUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_MAIN_URL;var GetStylesUrl=MainUrl+"api/Instrument/GetAllStyles";var getAllStyles=function getAllStyles(){return Http.get(GetStylesUrl).then(function(res){return res.data.result;}).catch(function(err){return;});};export var useAllStyles=function useAllStyles(){return useQuery("styles",getAllStyles,{retry:1,retryDelay:500,refetchOnWindowFocus:false});};
